273d66505d95.bio: Do something. The world won't save itself.
273d66505d95.name: Vinny

paragraphs.text: Great article. I haven’t played Stardew Valley yet, but it is on my list. I liked the Harvest Moon games back in the day, and it sounds like this improves upon Harvest Moon in every way. I don’t have to work over the summer, so I’ll have plenty of time to play it then.
paragraphs.name: 760d

90ce7ef70f79.title: The famous J-RPG, SMT Persona Series by Atlus has also those features….

paragraphs.text: The famous J-RPG, SMT Persona Series by Atlus has also those features…. Cycle Engagement and challenging time management skills. it’s a mix of Pokemon and The Sims / Dating / Bishojo game….. your decision will impact your battle skills….
paragraphs.name: d561

8a8f642314c0.title: This is exactly what had happened to me when I played Harvest Moon years ago.

paragraphs.text: This is exactly what had happened to me when I played Harvest Moon years ago. I thought I can just put down the controller after a good in game day, just to find out that my crops have grown already the next day and ready to be sold…
paragraphs.name: f021

paragraphs.text: Genius.
paragraphs.name: b283

paragraphs.text: Thanks for your comment! I agree, Stardew’s relaxing and unobtrusive vibe contributes greatly to its uniqueness. There’s no fight or flight stemming from fear of death, there’s no must-complete objectives. The game throws a lot at you but what you want to do is completely your choice.
paragraphs.name: dba1

fd77cce817ab.title: I really appreciate your thoughtful approach to this article along with anchoring your thoughts on…

paragraphs.text: I really appreciate your thoughtful approach to this article along with anchoring your thoughts on cited research. I wish we had more writers like you covering our field.

d7ed0f44479c.title: Thank you so much for your kind words! It means a lot, and encourages me to write more! :)

paragraphs.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! It means a lot, and encourages me to write more! :)
paragraphs.name: e747

25c30e2bd630.title: I’ve clocked up 50+ hours on Stardew Valley and I still can’t get a dance partner!

paragraphs.text: I’ve clocked up 50+ hours on Stardew Valley and I still can’t get a dance partner! But seriously, I love this game because it’s a great change from the serious, AAA, FPS, realism etc. games that are out there. I love playing those types of games too, but I think there could be more games like Stardew!
I’m scared to try it :)
paragraphs.name: 2d2d
